#summary How to add an image preview

= Introduction =
To add an image preview as below:

[http://gtkjfilechooser.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/GtkJFileChooser/site/img/Preview.png]

simply set `ImagePreviewer` (in the package `eu.kostia.gtkjfilechooser.ui`) as an accessory component in the `JFileChooser` object:
{{{
JFileChooser chooser = new JFileChooser();
chooser.setAccessory(new ImagePreviewer(chooser));
}}}
and you're done!
